FOR ENGLISH:

Package 4 farcry game on xbox 360.

For those who don`t know how to install. Following is a quick tutorial:

You need at least one stick of 8GB

1st format your flash drive to your xbox

2nd impales him on the computer

3rd opens the horizon

4th goes to the device that you put on your PC (USB stick or external hard drive) click inject new look for the game file that you downloaded the file, click Open (the process can take a lot, around 30 minutes because the file is large ). after that, make sure the success message appeared on the computer screen, if yes, everything ok, if not, try the procedure again.

5. Remove the device from the PC, reenter the XBOX, go to settings> Storage> select the device you inserted the xbox, go to apps and games, there you will find the file, just copy it to your internal HD, or if it has no internal hard drive, can play directly from the USB stick
